verses.verse: And it came to pass a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had given rest <S%H5117><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> from all their enemies <S%H341><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> waxed old <S%H2204><s%> and stricken <S%H935><s%> in age <S%H3117><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and for their elders <S%H2205><s%>, and for their heads <S%H7218><s%>, and for their judges <S%H8199><s%>, and for their officers <S%H7860><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them, I am old <S%H2204><s%> and stricken <S%H935><s%> in age <S%H3117><s%>:

And ye have seen <S%H7200><s%> all that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> unto all these nations <S%H1471><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of you; for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is he that hath fought <S%H3898><s%> for you.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have divided <S%H5307><s%> unto you by lot these nations <S%H1471><s%> that remain <S%H7604><s%>, to be an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, from Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, with all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that I have cut off <S%H3772><s%>, even unto the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> westward <S%H3996><s%> <S%H8121><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, he shall expel <S%H1920><s%> them from before <S%H6440><s%> you, and drive <S%H3423><s%> them from out of your sight <S%H6440><s%>; and ye shall possess <S%H3423><s%> their land <S%H776><s%>, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath promised <S%H1696><s%> unto you.

Be ye therefore very <S%H3966><s%> courageous <S%H2388><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> all that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, that ye turn <S%H5493><s%> not aside therefrom to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left <S%H8040><s%>;

That ye come <S%H935><s%> not among these nations <S%H1471><s%>, these that remain <S%H7604><s%> among you; neither make mention <S%H2142><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%>, nor cause to swear <S%H7650><s%> by them, neither serve <S%H5647><s%> them, nor bow <S%H7812><s%> yourselves unto them:
But cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, as ye have done <S%H6213><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath driven out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you great <S%H1419><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and strong <S%H6099><s%>: but as for you, no man <S%H376><s%> hath been able to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

One <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, he it is that fighteth <S%H3898><s%> for you, as he hath promised <S%H1696><s%> you.
Take good <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> therefore unto yourselves <S%H5315><s%>, that ye love <S%H157><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

Else if ye do in any wise <S%H7725><s%> go back <S%H7725><s%>, and cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%>, even these that remain <S%H7604><s%> among you, and shall make marriages <S%H2859><s%> with them, and go in <S%H935><s%> unto them, and they to you:

Know <S%H3045><s%> for a certainty <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will no more <S%H3254><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> any of these nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you; but they shall be snares <S%H6341><s%> and traps <S%H4170><s%> unto you, and scourges <S%H7850><s%> in your sides <S%H6654><s%>, and thorns <S%H6796><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, until ye perish <S%H6><s%> from off this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H127><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> you.

And, behold, this day <S%H3117><s%> I am going <S%H1980><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>: and ye know <S%H3045><s%> in all your hearts <S%H3824><s%> and in all your souls <S%H5315><s%>, that not one <S%H259><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> hath failed <S%H5307><s%> of all the good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> concerning you; all are come to pass <S%H935><s%> unto you, and not one <S%H259><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> hath failed <S%H5307><s%> thereof.

Therefore it shall come to pass, that as all good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> upon you, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> promised <S%H1696><s%> you; so shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> upon you all evil <S%H7451><s%> things <S%H1697><s%>, until he have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you from off this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H127><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> you.

When ye have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, and have gone <S%H1980><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and bowed <S%H7812><s%> yourselves to them; then shall the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, and ye shall perish <S%H6><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> from off the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which he hath given <S%H5414><s%> unto you.
